name: Trump Vs Jong UN
description:
Funny game with funny actor of the world.
In this game you can choose one of them, you can fire a bullet, when the bullet hit the head of the enemy, the flag will rise.
You can also heading nuclear bomb into the enemy area, the nuclear bomb will explode in 30 seconds, try to throw a nuclear bomb at the enemy. 
The first flag up to the top will win.
Enjoy the game, beat the person you hate
